content.html: [...] Using jQuery to Query Featured Images To achieve these goals, I began coding the front-end using jQuery. Then for my AJAX calls, I added code to my theme’s functions.php so that WordPress could receive my query requests directly. This meant my AJAX calls could reference the theme’s main URL (e.g. http://example.com?action=getimage) rather than referencing some additional PHP file setup to specifically handle AJAX requests (for more info on this, check out this post by Will Norris).
